title: User Onboarding and Authentication
summary: Implement secure onboarding, registration, and authentication processes
description: Develop a secure onboarding process that enables users to register, verify their identity, and log into the banking system safely. Include KYC verification, multi-factor authentication, and biometric login to ensure user data protection and compliance with banking regulations.

title: Account Management Dashboard
summary: Provide a unified view for users to manage their bank accounts
description: Create an interactive dashboard where users can view balances, manage multiple account types, and access real-time transaction updates. The interface should be intuitive, secure, and optimized for both web and mobile devices.

title: Fund Transfer and Payments
summary: Enable seamless intra-bank and inter-bank fund transfer capabilities
description: Implement fund transfer features allowing users to transfer money within their own accounts or to external beneficiaries. Include validations, OTP confirmations, receipts, and transaction logs compliant with security and regulatory standards.

title: Bill Payment and Recharge Services
summary: Integrate bill payment and mobile recharge functionalities
description: Incorporate services for utility bill payments, mobile and DTH recharges, and credit card bill settlements. Support third-party integrations and scheduled auto-payments to enhance user convenience.

title: Loan and Credit Management
summary: Provide digital solutions for loan and credit card management
description: Develop a feature that allows users to apply for loans, view EMI schedules, monitor outstanding debts, and track credit utilization. Include eligibility checks and integration with credit bureau data for informed approvals.

title: Transaction Insights and Analytics
summary: Offer analytics-based insights into user transactions
description: Build analytics capabilities that categorize user transactions, analyze spending behavior, and generate financial summaries. Implement visualization dashboards and personalized insights to support better financial decisions.

title: Fraud Detection and Security Monitoring
summary: Ensure security through AI-driven fraud detection and alerts
description: Develop AI models to detect suspicious transactions in real-time, send alerts to users, and escalate high-risk activities for review. Maintain audit trails and integrate with compliance systems for regulatory oversight.

title: Customer Support and Assistance
summary: Implement digital customer support tools within the banking platform
description: Add support channels like live chat, ticketing, and a knowledge base to assist users with queries. Integrate with CRM systems for efficient support resolution and personalized customer experience.
